line_1: Know, your arrears with ev'ry hour accrue,
line_2: For mercy shown while wrath is justly due.

line_1: And find no fatal influence accrue;
line_2: Undazled now, I thy weak Taper View,

line_1: What Satisfaction can from thence accrue,
line_2: Suppose she pities, and believes me true;

line_1: What Satisfaction can from thence accrue,
line_2: Unless her Pity, makes her love me too?

line_1: What woes from mortal ills accrue!
Do the Ills of Mankind from Religion accrue! —
line_2: O how shall we know the right Way to pursue! —
